    • Uses of GameObject in nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard

      Subclasses of GameObject in nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Dashboard
      Create or extend this class to create a new dashboard, a dashboard object will be drawn above the ViewPort when added to the dashboard list inside the GameEngine (addDashboard).
      class  FPSCounter
      The FPSCounter is used by the GameEngine and shows the Frames Per Second on the screen.
